description: This file declares the interface for an RPC client in C, including initialization functions, a function to retrieve the client instance, and a utility to check for connection loss. It also includes necessary headers and licensing information.

methods.name: initRPC
methods.description: Initializes the RPC client with the provided machine IP address.

methods.name: getClientInstance
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the current RPC client instance.

methods.name: isRPCConnectionLoss
methods.description: Checks whether the RPC connection has been lost based on an error string.
